<<<<<<< HEAD
The infallible true and assured vvitch: or, The second edition, of The tryall of witch-craft Shewing the right and true methode of the discouerie: with a confutation of erroneous vvayes, carefully reuiewed and more fully cleared and augmented. By Iohn Cotta, Doctor in Physicke. Triall of witch-craft Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?
[16], 155, [3] p.
Printed by I[ohn] L[egat] for Richard Higgenbotham, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1624.
Printer's name from STC. A reissue, with cancel title page, of: The triall of witch-craft, 1624. With a final errata leaf. Running title reads: The triall of witch-craft, with the true discouerie thereof. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

By Iohn Cotta, Doctor in Physicke. Triall of witch-craft Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?
[16], 155, [3] p.
Printed by I[ohn] L[egat] for Richard Higgenbotham, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1624.
Printer's name from STC. A reissue, with cancel title page, of: The triall of witch-craft, 1624. With a final errata leaf. Running title reads: The triall of witch-craft, with the true discouerie thereof. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
